task.title: Navigating the Document Model
task.shortdesc: The Document Model is a deconstructed

step.cmd: Click on a section in the document model.
step.info: Each section of grey lines represents a different section/chapter/article within the document. The table of contents and the title at the top of text column will tell you what section you've selected.

step.cmd: Work with the "Index," "Tags," and "Stats" and see what lines are highlighted.
When you are done working with the Document model or would like to start a new search, click on the "Clear" button at the top of the Document Model.
